items: Mix the milk and the cream, put half of it to heat in a pot with the vanilla bean or the essence. Then bring it to a boil.
Beat the egg yolks and sugar in a bowl.
In the same bowl add the other half of the cream and milk mixture.
Pour the cream and milk with the already hot vanilla over the bowl, stirring constantly.
_Now comes the tricky step_, reheat everything in a pot so that it thickens without clinging to the bottom of the pot. For this, it will be important to **keep stirring**.
Serve in bowls and let it cool in the fridge for at least 4 hours.

description: To complete the plating, you can decorate with a Marie cookies and cinnamon.
